message.content:
cs.IR, cs.LG, cs.DS, cs.SI, cs.DB 

This paper is likely to belong to the Information Retrieval (cs.IR) sub-category as it deals with building recommendation algorithms. It could also belong to the Machine Learning (cs.LG) sub-category as it mentions the challenges in building recommendation systems and proposes a probabilistic algorithm. The use of massively distributed storage systems such as Hadoop suggests that it could also belong to the Data Structures and Algorithms (cs.DS) sub-category. The focus on implicit feedback and user logs could also make it relevant to the Social and Information Networks (cs.SI) sub-category. Finally, the use of large datasets and the need for scalability could make it relevant to the Databases (cs.DB) sub-category.
